The Chinese have a great point, just as the protestors in Seoul do. The revision of Japan's history textbooks is unjustifiable and inexcusable.  Attacking Japanese restaurants in China, however, and terrorizing the Chinese workers there is not the best way to deal with the issue. In fact, if I had to think of a more immature and ineffective way to deal with it, I'd be hard pressed.
